definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: A recent study aimed to evaluate how consumers understand the concept of minerality.
sentences.chinese: 最近一項研究就試圖探明消費者對這一概念的理解。

sentences.english: Aim To make clear the concept of mathematics in Mojing systematically.
sentences.chinese: 目的探明《墨經》中數學概念的定義方式。

sentences.english: They proved up 22 billion tons of oil in reserves in this country.
sentences.chinese: 他們探明這個國家有220億噸石油的儲藏量。

sentences.english: Libya has Africa's largest proven crude-oil reserves.
sentences.chinese: 利比亞擁有非洲最大的已探明原油儲備。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia, by comparison, has21 percent of the world's proven oil.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，沙特石油儲量佔全球已探明儲量的21%。

sentences.english: The wood of the river and black Chuans all for exploring clear this malert: but dedicating own life.
sentences.chinese: 江木和黑川都是爲了探明這件事而獻出了自己的生命。

sentences.english: The geologist proves up a coal deposits.
sentences.chinese: 地質學家探明瞭一個煤礦的藏量。

sentences.english: The geologist proves up a coal deposit.
sentences.chinese: 地質學家探明瞭一個煤礦的藏量。

sentences.english: The Bainiuchang Ag deposit is a large Ag-Sn-pb-Zn deposit discovered and explored in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 白牛廠銀礦是近年發現探明的一大型銀錫鉛鋅礦牀。

sentences.english: The shift mechanisms of emission bands of organic dyes were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究探明瞭有機染料的熒光發射波長的位移機制。

sentences.english: Subsequent discoverjes were made by geological mapping and low-level airborne radiometric surveys.
sentences.chinese: 地質填圖和低空放射性航測又繼續探明瞭一批礦點。

sentences.english: The Shagou ore deposit is a large-size silver-lead-zinc deposit in west Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 河南熊耳山沙溝礦牀是新探明的一個大型銀鉛鋅礦牀。

sentences.english: They were sent ahead of the main troops to examine the enemy's position.
sentences.chinese: 他們被派作主力部隊的先遣小組，去探明敵人的陣地。

sentences.english: The wise jobseeker explores place the day before.
sentences.chinese: 明智的求職者總是前一天探明地方。

sentences.english: The oil-bearing structure of the new oil field has been verified.
sentences.chinese: 新油田的含油層結構已經探明。

sentences.english: Russia is first in what are called "proved reserves" of natural gas. The United States is sixth.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯位列“探明”天然氣貯量第一，美國第六。

definition: remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to suss out/to figure out/to ascertain
